name: df-leop
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cleo, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s1), chod, cv(s0)), cho), wral(s2, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(s1), chod, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), csp, cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define positive operator ordering. Definition VI.1 of [Retherford] p. 49. Note that ` ( ~H X. 0H ) <_op T ` means that ` T ` is a positive operator. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
